text: Płońsk is a city in Central Poland in the Masovian Voivodeship. It has a population of 23,000 and has an area of 12 km². It is the birthplace of the Zionist leader and first Prime Minister of Israel, David Ben-Gurion. == Other websites == * Map of the City of Płońsk * Official website of the City of Płońsk Category:Cities in Masovian Voivodeship
title: Płońsk
